color.title: Color
color.description: Color of the tube. If not specified, the primitives group color is used.

label_template.title: Label Template
label_template.description: Template used to construct the label. Use {{angle}} as placeholder for the value.

label_size.title: Label Size
label_size.description: Size of the label. Auto scales it by the average magnitude of (b - a) and (c - b).

show_vector.title: Show Vector
show_vector.description: Draw vectors between (a, b) and (b, c).

show_section.title: Show Section
show_section.description: Draw a filled circle section representing the angle.

section_color.title: Section Color
section_color.description: Color of the angle section. If not specified, the primitives group color is used.

section_radius.title: Section Radius
section_radius.description: Radius of the angle section. In angstroms.

section_radius_scale.title: Section Radius Scale
section_radius_scale.description: Factor to scale the radius of the angle section. Ignored if section_radius is set.

ComponentExpression.title: ComponentExpression
ComponentExpression.description: Component expressions are used to make selections.

label_entity_id.title: Label Entity Id
label_entity_id.description: Select an entity by its identifier

label_asym_id.title: Label Asym Id
label_asym_id.description: Select a chain using its standard, programmatically-assigned identifier

auth_asym_id.title: Auth Asym Id
auth_asym_id.description: Select a chain using its legacy, author-assigned identifier

label_seq_id.title: Label Seq Id
label_seq_id.description: Select a residue by its standard, programmatically-assigned sequence position

auth_seq_id.title: Auth Seq Id
auth_seq_id.description: Select a residue by its legacy, author-assigned sequence position

pdbx_PDB_ins_code.title: Pdbx Pdb Ins Code
pdbx_PDB_ins_code.description: Optional legacy insertion code, only relevant for `auth_seq_id`

beg_label_seq_id.title: Beg Label Seq Id
beg_label_seq_id.description: Defines a consecutive range of residues when combined with `end_label_seq_id`.

end_label_seq_id.title: End Label Seq Id
end_label_seq_id.description: Defines a consecutive range of residues when combined with `beg_label_seq_id`. End indices are inclusive.

beg_auth_seq_id.title: Beg Auth Seq Id
beg_auth_seq_id.description: Defines a consecutive range of residues when combined with `end_auth_seq_id`.

end_auth_seq_id.title: End Auth Seq Id
end_auth_seq_id.description: Defines a consecutive range of residues when combined with `beg_auth_seq_id`. End indices are inclusive.

residue_index.title: Residue Index
residue_index.description: 0-based residue index in the source file

atom_index.title: Atom Index
atom_index.description: 0-based atom index in the source file

structure_ref.title: Structure Ref
structure_ref.description: Reference to a structure node to apply this expresion to. If undefined, get the structure implicitly from the tree.

expression_schema.title: Expression Schema
expression_schema.description: Schema the expressions follow, used for optimization of structure query resolution.

expressions.title: Expressions
expressions.description: Expression refencing elements froms the structure_ref.

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: If specified, the endpoint is computed as start + direction.

length.title: Length
length.description: Length of the arrow. If unset, the distance between start and end is used.

show_start_cap.title: Show Start Cap
show_start_cap.description: Draw a cap at the start of the arrow.

show_end_cap.title: Show End Cap
show_end_cap.description: Draw a cap at the end of the arrow.

show_tube.title: Show Tube
show_tube.description: Draw a tube between the start and end of the arrow.

color.title: Color
color.description: Color of the arrow. If not specified, the primitives group color is used.

tooltip.title: Tooltip
tooltip.description: Tooltip to show when hovering on the arrow.

extent.description: The width, the height, and the depth of the box. Added to the bounding box determined by the center.

show_faces.title: Show Faces

edge_radius.description: Radius of the box edges. In angstroms.

as_circle.description: If true, ignores radius_minor/magnitude of the minor axis.

major_axis_endpoint.title: Major Axis Endpoint
major_axis_endpoint.description: Major axis endpoint. If specified, overrides major axis to be major_axis_endpoint - center.

minor_axis_endpoint.title: Minor Axis Endpoint
minor_axis_endpoint.description: Minor axis endpoint. If specified, overrides minor axis to be minor_axis_endpoint - center.

radius_major.title: Radius Major
radius_major.description: Radius of the major axis. If unset, the length of the major axis is used.

radius_minor.title: Radius Minor
radius_minor.description: Radius of the minor axis. If unset, the length of the minor axis is used.

theta_start.title: Theta Start
theta_start.description: Start of the arc. In radians.

theta_end.title: Theta End
theta_end.description: End of the arc. In radians.

tooltip.description: Tooltip to show when hovering on the ellipse.

FocusInlineParams.title: FocusInlineParams
FocusInlineParams.description: Define the camera focus based on function arguments.

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: Direction of the view (vector position -> target)

up.title: Up
up.description: Controls the rotation around the vector between target and position

radius.title: Radius
radius.description: Radius of the focused sphere (overrides `radius_factor` and `radius_extra`)

radius_factor.title: Radius Factor
radius_factor.description: Radius of the focused sphere relative to the radius of parent component (default: 1). Focused radius = component_radius * radius_factor + radius_extent.

radius_extent.title: Radius Extent
radius_extent.description: Addition to the radius of the focused sphere, if computed from the radius of parent component (default: 0). Focused radius = component_radius * radius_factor + radius_extent.

GlobalMetadata.title: GlobalMetadata
GlobalMetadata.description: Top-level metadata for a MVS file (single-state or multi-state).

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: Timestamp when this file was exported.

version.title: Version
version.description: Version of MolViewSpec used to write this file.

category_name.title: Category Name
category_name.description: Category wherein selection is located. Only applies when format is 'cif' or 'bcif'.

field_name.title: Field Name
field_name.description: Name of the column in CIF or field name (key) in JSON that contains the desired value (color/label/tooltip/component...); the default value is 'color'/'label'/'tooltip'/'component' depending on the node kind

block_header.title: Block Header
block_header.description: Block name wherein selection is located. Only applies when format is 'cif' or 'bcif'.

block_index.title: Block Index
block_index.description: Block index wherein selection is located. Only applies when format is 'cif' or 'bcif'.

LinesParams.title: LinesParams
LinesParams.description: Low-level, fully customizable lines representation of a shape.

vertices.title: Vertices
vertices.description: 3N length array of floats with vertex position (x1, y1, z1, ...)

indices.title: Indices
indices.description: 2N length array of indices into vertices that form lines (l1_1, ll1_2, ...)

line_groups.title: Line Groups
line_groups.description: Assign a number to each triangle to group them.

group_colors.title: Group Colors
group_colors.description: Assign a color to each group. If not assigned, default primitives group color is used. Takes precedence over line_colors.

group_tooltips.title: Group Tooltips
group_tooltips.description: Assign an optional tooltip to each group.

group_widths.title: Group Widths
group_widths.description: Assign an optional line width to each group. Take precedence over `width`.

tooltip.title: Tooltip
tooltip.description: Tooltip shown when hovering over the lines. Assigned group_tooltips take precedence.

MeshParams.title: MeshParams
MeshParams.description: Low-level, fully customizable mesh representation of a shape.

vertices.title: Vertices
vertices.description: 3N length array of floats with vertex position (x1, y1, z1, ...)

indices.title: Indices
indices.description: 3N length array of indices into vertices that form triangles (t1_1, t1_2, t1_3, ...)

triangle_groups.title: Triangle Groups
triangle_groups.description: Assign a number to each triangle to group them. If not set, each triangle is considered a separate group.

group_colors.title: Group Colors
group_colors.description: Assign a color to each group. If not assigned, default primitives group color is used.

group_tooltips.title: Group Tooltips
group_tooltips.description: Assign an optional tooltip to each group.

tooltip.title: Tooltip
tooltip.description: Tooltip shown when hovering over the mesh. Assigned group_tooltips take precedence.

show_triangles.title: Show Triangles
show_triangles.description: Determine whether to render triangles of the mesh

show_wireframe.title: Show Wireframe
show_wireframe.description: Determine whether to render wireframe of the mesh

wireframe_color.title: Wireframe Color
wireframe_color.description: Wireframe color, uses triangle/group colors when not set

Node.title: Node
Node.description: Base impl of all state tree nodes.

params.title: Params
params.description: Optional params that are needed for this node.

children.title: Children
children.description: Optional collection of nested child nodes.

custom.title: Custom
custom.description: Custom data to store attached to this node.

ref.title: Ref
ref.description: Optional reference that can be used to access this node.

OpacityInlineParams.title: OpacityInlineParams
OpacityInlineParams.description: Change the opacity/transparency of a representation based on parameters.

selector.title: Selector
selector.description: Describes one or more selections or one of the enumerated selectors.

opacity.title: Opacity
opacity.description: Opacity of a representation. 0.0: fully transparent, 1.0: fully opaque

ComponentExpression.title: ComponentExpression
ComponentExpression.description: Component expressions are used to make selections.

label_entity_id.title: Label Entity Id
label_entity_id.description: Select an entity by its identifier

label_asym_id.title: Label Asym Id
label_asym_id.description: Select a chain using its standard, programmatically-assigned identifier

auth_asym_id.title: Auth Asym Id
auth_asym_id.description: Select a chain using its legacy, author-assigned identifier

label_seq_id.title: Label Seq Id
label_seq_id.description: Select a residue by its standard, programmatically-assigned sequence position

auth_seq_id.title: Auth Seq Id
auth_seq_id.description: Select a residue by its legacy, author-assigned sequence position

pdbx_PDB_ins_code.title: Pdbx Pdb Ins Code
pdbx_PDB_ins_code.description: Optional legacy insertion code, only relevant for `auth_seq_id`

beg_label_seq_id.title: Beg Label Seq Id
beg_label_seq_id.description: Defines a consecutive range of residues when combined with `end_label_seq_id`.

end_label_seq_id.title: End Label Seq Id
end_label_seq_id.description: Defines a consecutive range of residues when combined with `beg_label_seq_id`. End indices are inclusive.

beg_auth_seq_id.title: Beg Auth Seq Id
beg_auth_seq_id.description: Defines a consecutive range of residues when combined with `end_auth_seq_id`.

end_auth_seq_id.title: End Auth Seq Id
end_auth_seq_id.description: Defines a consecutive range of residues when combined with `beg_auth_seq_id`. End indices are inclusive.

residue_index.title: Residue Index
residue_index.description: 0-based residue index in the source file

atom_index.title: Atom Index
atom_index.description: 0-based atom index in the source file

ParseParams.title: ParseParams
ParseParams.description: Parse node, describing how to parse downloaded data.

format.title: Format
format.description: The format of the structure data.

structure_ref.title: Structure Ref
structure_ref.description: Reference to a structure node to apply this expresion to. If undefined, get the structure implicitly from the tree.

expression_schema.title: Expression Schema
expression_schema.description: Schema the expressions follow, used for optimization of structure query resolution.

expressions.title: Expressions
expressions.description: Expression refencing elements froms the structure_ref.

expression_schema.title: Expression Schema

references.title: References
references.description: List of nodes the data are referencing

color.title: Color
color.description: Default color for primitives in this group

label_color.title: Label Color
label_color.description: Default label color for primitives in this group

tooltip.title: Tooltip
tooltip.description: Default tooltip for primitives in this group

opacity.title: Opacity
opacity.description: Opacity of primitive geometry in this group

label_opacity.title: Label Opacity
label_opacity.description: Opacity of primitive labels in this group

instances.title: Instances
instances.description: Instances of this primitive group defined as 4x4 column major (j * 4 + i indexing) transformation matrices

RepresentationParams.title: RepresentationParams
RepresentationParams.description: Representation node, describing how to represent a component.

type.title: Type
type.description: Representation type, i.e. cartoon, ball_and_stick, etc.

Snapshot.title: Snapshot
Snapshot.description: Root node of an individual state tree (snapshot) within a collection of snapshots (`States`).

Node.title: Node
Node.description: Base impl of all state tree nodes.

params.title: Params
params.description: Optional params that are needed for this node.

children.title: Children
children.description: Optional collection of nested child nodes.

custom.title: Custom
custom.description: Custom data to store attached to this node.

ref.title: Ref
ref.description: Optional reference that can be used to access this node.

key.title: Key
key.description: Unique identifier of this state, useful when working with collections of states.

transition_duration_ms.title: Transition Duration Ms
transition_duration_ms.description: Timespan for the animation to the next snapshot. Leave empty to skip animations.

key.title: Key
key.description: Unique identifier of this state, useful when working with collections of states.

transition_duration_ms.title: Transition Duration Ms
transition_duration_ms.description: Timespan for the animation to the next snapshot. Leave empty to skip animations.

SpacefillParams.title: SpacefillParams
SpacefillParams.description: Representation node, describing how to represent a component.

ignore_hydrogens.title: Ignore Hydrogens
ignore_hydrogens.descripton: Controls whether hydrogen atoms are drawn.

State.title: State
State.description: Root node of a single state tree with metadata.

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: Specifies whether this is an individual state or a collection of states.

params.title: Params

GlobalMetadata.description: Top-level metadata for a MVS file (single-state or multi-state).

timestamp.title: Timestamp

version.title: Version
version.description: Version of MolViewSpec used to write this file.

States.title: States
States.description: Root node of state descriptions that encompass multiple distinct state trees (snapshots).

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: Specifies whether this is an individual state or a collection of states.

StructureParams.title: StructureParams
StructureParams.description: Structure node, describing which type (assembly 1, deposited coordinates, etc.) of the parsed data to create.

type.title: Type
type.description: How to interpret the loaded data

assembly_id.title: Assembly Id
assembly_id.description: Use the name to specify which assembly to load

assembly_index.title: Assembly Index
assembly_index.description: 0-based assembly index, use this to load the 1st assembly

model_index.title: Model Index
model_index.description: 0-based model index in case multiple NMR frames are present

block_index.title: Block Index
block_index.description: 0-based block index in case multiple mmCIF or SDF data blocks are present

block_header.title: Block Header
block_header.description: Reference a specific mmCIF or SDF data block by its block header

radius.title: Radius
radius.description: Radius around model coordinates when loading symmetry mates

SurfaceParams.title: SurfaceParams
SurfaceParams.description: Representation node, describing how to represent a component.

ignore_hydrogens.title: Ignore Hydrogens
ignore_hydrogens.descripton: Controls whether hydrogen atoms are drawn.

TooltipFromSourceParams.title: TooltipFromSourceParams
TooltipFromSourceParams.description: Abstract node that's shared by all selections based on the source file.

field_name.title: Field Name
field_name.description: Name of the column in CIF that contains the desired value (color/label/tooltip/component...); the default value is 'color'/'label'/'tooltip'/'component' depending on the node kind

block_header.title: Block Header
block_header.description: Block name wherein selection is located.

block_index.title: Block Index
block_index.description: Block index wherein selection is located.

TooltipFromUriParams.title: TooltipFromUriParams
TooltipFromUriParams.description: Abstract node that's shared by all resource-based selections.

format.title: Format
format.description: Format of the resource, i.e. 'cif', 'bcif', or 'json'

category_name.title: Category Name
category_name.description: Category wherein selection is located. Only applies when format is 'cif' or 'bcif'.

field_name.title: Field Name
field_name.description: Name of the column in CIF or field name (key) in JSON that contains the desired value (color/label/tooltip/component...); the default value is 'color'/'label'/'tooltip'/'component' depending on the node kind

block_header.title: Block Header
block_header.description: Block name wherein selection is located. Only applies when format is 'cif' or 'bcif'.

block_index.title: Block Index
block_index.description: Block index wherein selection is located. Only applies when format is 'cif' or 'bcif'.

text.title: Text
text.description: Text to show as tooltip upon hover

rotation.title: Rotation
rotation.description: 9d vector describing the rotation, in a column major (j * 3 + i indexing) format, this is equivalent to Fortran-order in numpy, to be multiplied from the left

color.title: Color
color.description: Color of the tube. If not specified, the primitives group color is used.

tooltip.title: Tooltip
tooltip.description: Tooltip to show when hovering on the tube.

Component.title: Component
Component.description: Builder step with operations relevant for a particular component.

Download.title: Download
Download.description: Builder step with operations needed after downloading structure data.

Parse.title: Parse
Parse.description: Builder step with operations needed after parsing structure data.

Primitives.title: Primitives
Primitives.description:
A collection of primitives (such as spheres, lines, ...) that will be grouped together and can be customized using
options.

PrimitivesFromUri.title: PrimitivesFromUri
PrimitivesFromUri.description: A collection of primitives (such as spheres, lines, ...) that will be loaded from provided resource.

Representation.title: Representation
Representation.description: Builder step with operations relating to particular representations.

Root.title: Root
Root.description:
The builder for MolViewSpec state descriptions. Provides fine-grained options as well as global properties such as
canvas color or camera position and functionality to eventually export this scene.

Structure.title: Structure
Structure.description: Builder step with operations needed after defining the structure to work with.

Volume.title: Volume
Volume.description: Internal base node from which all other builder nodes are derived.

VolumeRepresentation.title: VolumeRepresentation
VolumeRepresentation.description: Builder step with operations relating to particular representations.

_Base.title: _Base
_Base.description: Internal base node from which all other builder nodes are derived.
